Settings Alain Pimentel Alain Pimentel (423)910-9115 4239109115 halainpb@gmail.com I recently graduated with a BS in CS and Math. My passion in the developer world is Android. Activities, fragments, Material Design, you name it. But no Android app should be alone, I can also work with its good companions: databases, REST APIs and JSON.
When I'm not programming you will find me playing soccer, talking about Game of Thrones, playing FIFA with my mates, or climbing (still too noob). 242 Curtner Ave.
